name: BlockSpring
description: Blockspring creates APIs for your Python, Ruby, and R scripts, so you can call them via HTTP. No server setup required. Paste in a script, double click on variables to make them parameters in your API, and click publish. No need to think about deploying code or spinning up servers - it just works.
